name: Sync Your Tunes
short_description:
*****Updated******
Issue: If your Itunes music library is too big, SYT can 
not responding for some time. Trying to fix it.
*****Updated******

Sync Your Tunes is a free and easy way to sync your Itunes playlists with many devices, such as Android phone, WP8 phone, even a simple flash drive.

You can sync playlist in 3 clicks: just choose playlist to sync, then choose destination (your device) and click "Sync" button. Simple!

You can also play your playlists in this programm.

This software is on beta-state, so there is lots of bugs, but it's nessesary more usage info, to fix them.

Version 0.1.0.0 supports only english and russian letters in name of playlists and tracks, but it'll be fixed soon.
summary: Easy way to sync your Itunes playlists with many devices
